summary: Defines a Calibration utility class that prepares and manages configuration settings for running a health simulation scenario focused on maternal and perinatal outcomes. It handles generation of parameter draw sets, logging of calibration details, and provides access to the suite of disease and health system modules required for the model.
business_intent: Enable reproducible and systematic calibration of a maternalâ€‘perinatal health model by automating parameter sampling, logging, and module integration, supporting research and policy analysis of maternal and newborn health interventions.
